FEATURE IDEA: keep the downward scrolling but add a link feature that highlights like tasks...
Is this predefined structure worth it? Should you just have some underlying data structures? Or come out with a usecase first...
I think the progress you have made so far is largely from working through one use-case. Dont think too far ahead just yet. Time and place.
Should you focus on making the app look nice in Terminal? Might be the way in which you begin to really enjoy using it.
This means you have to focus on spacing and really diving into the rich library.
This would make you much more reliant on your macbook, but it is way more powerful so perhaps it is the way to go.
Maybe also group by hour...
But what if you are working on the cusp of an hour? Allow for hourlyy automatically or should you do a group function?
